name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer, I excel in **observability** and **tracing** within multi-language environments, utilizing **OpenTelemetry** for robust instrumentation. With 8 years of experience in full-stack development, I specialize in building resilient, high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors using modern **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter** technologies. My expertise spans the use of frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, alongside extensive cloud experience with **Azure** and **AWS**. 
I actively contribute to community collaboration and emphasize strong communication and teamwork skills to foster effective project execution. I’ve successfully led the development of enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and intelligent automation. Additionally, I bring a strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. My hands-on experience includes developing machine learning pipelines and implementing MLOps workflows using tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, all while maintaining thorough documentation to support project transparency and continuity.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented observability and **tracing** solutions using **OpenTelemetry** SDKs to enhance performance monitoring across multi-language environments.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams, fostering **community collaboration** and ensuring clear **communication** to deliver high-quality software solutions.
Designed and maintained comprehensive documentation for software features, enhancing project visibility and supporting knowledge sharing within the team.
Architected and developed scalable, full-stack healthcare and financial platforms using **TypeScript**, **Python (FastAPI)**, **Node.js**, and modern front-end frameworks including **React (17-18)**, **Next.js**, and **Vue (3.x)**, while ensuring compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, and financial regulatory standards (e.g., PCI DSS, SOX).
Developed and deployed cross-platform mobile applications using **Flutter** and **React Native**, delivering seamless healthcare and fintech user experiences across iOS and Android platforms, with native module integration and state management using **Provider** and **Redux**.
Implemented mobile-specific CI/CD pipelines using **Fastlane** and **App Center**, with automated testing, release management, and crash/error analytics (**Firebase Crashlytics**, **Sentry**).
Led the re-architecture of monolithic applications into microservices-based ecosystems, employing **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and serverless architectures (**AWS Lambda**, **Azure Functions**), enabling high availability and fault tolerance.
Designed and maintained cloud-native data architecture using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **GraphQL**, optimizing for large-scale healthcare and financial data ingestion, storage, and querying.
Designed and deployed machine learning models for use cases such as patient risk prediction, financial fraud detection, and document classification using **Python (scikit-learn, PyTorch, TensorFlow)**, and integrated real-time inference services into the backend.
Built MLOps pipelines using **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Apache Airflow** for continuous training, validation, versioning, and deployment of models across development and production environments.
Integrated AI-based features into client-facing applications, such as smart financial dashboards, personalized health recommendations, and predictive alerts, powered by trained models and APIs hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.
Implemented enterprise-level DevOps pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and **CircleCI**, incorporating linting, testing, security scans, and multi-environment deployments for both web and API services.
Delivered complex financial data visualization tools using **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling real-time insights into transaction trends, fraud detection, and operational KPIs.
Collaborated with data scientists to integrate NLP models (using **spaCy**, **Hugging Face Transformers**) for healthcare document parsing and financial anomaly detection, embedding them into core services through RESTful APIs.
Established test strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, **PyTest**, and **Postman**, covering unit, integration, E2E, and contract testing across both front-end and backend services.
Integrated **Azure Cognitive Search** and **ElasticSearch** to enable advanced search capabilities across millions of unstructured and structured health records and financial documents.

Demonstrated expertise in **OpenTelemetry** to enhance application observability through efficient **tracing** and **instrumentation**, ensuring seamless performance monitoring across services.
Fostered **community collaboration** by actively participating in discussions about best practices in a **multi-language environment**, sharing insights on software development and enhancing team knowledge.
Emphasized **documentation** practices to create comprehensive guides for both technical and non-technical stakeholders, improving overall team communication and project transparency.
Led the development and modernization of financial platforms by adopting a **microservices-based architecture** using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, boosting scalability, maintainability, and throughput for high-volume transaction systems.
Built dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, applying **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create responsive and performant user interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals.
Developed real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to track financial activity, detect anomalies, and generate actionable insights.
Integrated **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to establish a robust event-driven architecture, supporting asynchronous communication and real-time event processing for transactions, alerts, and compliance workflows.
Built and orchestrated ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enabling batch and real-time ingestion of financial data from internal and third-party sources.
Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, analyzing transaction patterns and user behavior to proactively flag suspicious activities in banking systems.
Created ML pipelines for credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification using **MLflow** and **Airflow**, integrating model inference directly into backend services for real-time decision-making.

Utilized **OpenTelemetry** for enhanced **observability** across backend services, implementing **tracing** and **instrumentation** to monitor application performance and reliability in a multi-language environment.
Facilitated **community collaboration** by documenting backend services and encouraging teamwork across diverse teams to streamline development processes while maintaining high code quality.
Designed and optimized backend services for a global e-commerce platform using **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**) and **Node.js** (**NestJS**, **Express**), ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using **WebSockets** and event-driven architecture powered by **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, enabling responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.
Developed frontend applications using **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, enhanced with **TypeScript**, **Redux Toolkit**, and **Tailwind CSS**, delivering fast, responsive user experiences on both web and mobile platforms.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows and caching frequently accessed resources for performance gains.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation engines using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow** to personalize product listings, optimize search relevance, and improve conversion rates based on real-time behavioral data.
Implemented **Redis** caching for product metadata, shopping cart sessions, and search results, significantly improving application responsiveness and reducing read pressure on databases.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **LaunchDarkly** and **Kubernetes** namespaces, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs using **Next.js**, **Vue 3** + **Nuxt**, and **HTML5/CSS3**, optimized for mobile-first engagement and accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.1).
Built secure payment workflows integrated with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, applying tokenized transactions and PCI-compliant handling of sensitive data.
Applied role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0** for secure customer and admin access, ensuring GDPR compliance and user data protection throughout the platform.
